00021 
00022 #include "cli/single_command.h"
00023 #include "consistency.h"
00024 
00025 using namespace cli;
00026 
00027 
00028 SingleCommand::SingleCommand(
00029         const std::string& STR_Command,
00030         OutputDevice& CLI_Output,
00031         const bool B_AutoDelete)
00032   : IODevice("cmd[" + STR_Command + "]", "\n", B_AutoDelete), m_cliOutput(CLI_Output),
00033     m_strCommand(STR_Command), m_iPosition(-1)
00034 {
00035     EnsureCommonDevices();
00036 
00037     m_cliOutput.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00038 }
00039 
00040 SingleCommand::~SingleCommand(void)
00041 {
00042     m_cliOutput.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00043 }
00044 
00045 const std::string& SingleCommand::GetCommand(void) const
00046 {
00047     return m_strCommand;
00048 }
00049 
00050 const bool SingleCommand::OpenDevice(void)
00051 {
00052     if (! m_cliOutput.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00053     {
00054         return false;
00055     }
00056 
00057     m_iPosition = 0;
00058     return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 const bool SingleCommand::CloseDevice(void)
00062 {
00063     bool b_Res = true;
00064 
00065     m_iPosition = -1;
00066 
00067     if (! m_cliOutput.CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00068     {
00069         b_Res = false;
00070     }
00071 
00072     return b_Res;
00073 }
00074 
00075 const KEY SingleCommand::GetKey(void) const
00076 {
00077     if ((m_iPosition >= 0) && (m_iPosition < (signed) m_strCommand.size()))
00078     {
00079         const char c_Char = m_strCommand[m_iPosition];
00080         m_iPosition ++;
00081         return IODevice::GetKey(c_Char);
00082     }
00083     else if (m_iPosition == (signed) m_strCommand.size())
00084     {
00085         m_iPosition ++;
00086         return IODevice::GetKey('\n');
00087     }
00088     else
00089     {
00090         return NULL_KEY;
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 void SingleCommand::PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const
00095 {
00096     m_cliOutput.PutString(STR_Out);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void SingleCommand::Beep(void) const
00100 {
00101     m_cliOutput.Beep();
00102 }
